description: A user uploads a photo of a cracked bathtub, provides policy details, and ClaimMate extracts the policy, runs OCR on the image, builds a claim form, predicts approval odds, and submits the claim, returning a claim reference and approval likelihood.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve policy information, extract details from images, populate claim forms, predict approval probability, and submit claims on behalf of the user.

Got it! I’ll pull your policy, analyze the photo, and start building the claim. Please hold on a moment.
